vehicles

Class AbstractVehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • vehicles.AbstractVehicle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProtoVehicle

    public abstract class AbstractVehicle
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class every Vehicle inherits from.
